channel.title: Learning on A Happy PhD
channel.description: Recent content in Learning on A Happy PhD

item.title: Productivity tip: How I do weekly reviews
item.description: Despite the emphasis I have made so far in developing productive and healthy everyday routines (from to-do lists to pomodoros), not everything about productivity happens at this tactical, day-to-day level. In this short post, I guide you through what I think is the centerpiece of my own personal productivity system: the weekly review.
